note.p: Birth: St Andrews, Fife, Scotland (10 October 1838)
Education: St Andrews; Edinburgh University. MD (1860, Edinburgh)

Career: Practised in Perthshire; Physician, Perth District Mental Hospital; Professor of Natural History, St Andrews University (1882-1917); Director, University Museum and of Gatty Marine Laboratory, St Andrews
Memberships: LRCSE (1860); FLS; FRSE; Zoological Society (Corresponding)
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc Series B 1932 vol 110 pp xxiv-xxviii, plate, by William Thomas Calman
